verses.name: Numbers 5:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 5:2
verses.text: Command the children of Israel, that they put out of the camp every leper, and every one that hath an issue, and whosoever is defiled by the dead:

verses.name: Numbers 5:3
verses.text: Both male and female shall ye put out, without the camp shall ye put them; that they defile not their camps, in the midst whereof I dwell.

verses.name: Numbers 5:4
verses.text: And the children of Israel did so, and put them out without the camp: as the Lord spake unto Moses, so did the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 5:5
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
